title: Any champions that are simple, fun and can carry games
body: As the title says, does anyone know any champs that are fun,simple,cheap and is able to carry?

replies.body: Oh LOL, thanks for the help, but I posted in the wrong place

Ashe or Garen would be a pretty good start! Annie can be a little more complicated to get her down, but she's also a fairly easy pick up. If you want more or better suggestions, post this topic over in Gameplay where other players can chime in.
